==Story==
{{VO/Story
|character           = Bennett
|language            = ko
|name                = 베넷

|vo_01_01_title      = 첫 만남…
|vo_01_01_subtitle   = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = 이게 네 모험단이야? 우와… 엄청 활기차고 정이 넘치잖아? 아, 난 「베니 모험단」의 단장, 베넷이라고 해! 날 동료로 받아줘! 부탁할게!
|vo_01_01_rm         = Ige ne moheomdaniya? Uwa... eomcheong hwalgichago jeong'i neomchijana? A, nan "Benni Moheomdan"ui danjang, Benesirato hae! Nal dongryoro badajwo! Butakhalge!
|vo_01_01_tl         = This is your adventure team? Wow... It's really vigorous and warmhearted! Ah, I'm the leader of "Benny's Adventure Team," Bennett! Please accept me as your colleague! Do me a favor!

|vo_02_01_title      = 잡담・보물
|vo_02_01_subtitle   = Chat: Treasures
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Treasures.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx         = 주위를 찾아보자. 보물이 있을지도 몰라!
|vo_02_01_rm         = Juwireul chajaboja. Bomuri isseuljido molla!
|vo_02_01_tl         = Let's look around. There might be a treasure!
|vo_02_02_title      = 잡담・모험
|vo_02_02_subtitle   = Chat: Adventures
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Adventures.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx         = 누군가와 함께 모험하는 건 정말 오랜만이야! 가자!
|vo_02_02_rm         = Nugungawa hamkke moheomhaneun geon jeongmal oraenmaniya! Gaja!
|vo_02_02_tl         = It's been such a long time since I've adventured with someone! Let's go!
|vo_02_03_title      = 잡담・조롱
|vo_02_03_subtitle   = Chat: Self-Deprecation
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Self-Deprication.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx         = 「가만히 있으면 좋은 일이 생기지 않는다」고 하잖아. 물론 나처럼 재수가 없다면 어딜 가도 똑같겠지만…
|vo_02_03_rm         = "Gamanhi isseumyeon joeun iri saenggiji anneunda"go hajana. Mullon nacheoreom jaesuga eopdamyeon eodil gado ttokkatgetjiman...
|vo_02_03_tl         = People say, "When you stay still, good things do not happen." But with an unlucky person like me, it will be the same everywhere...

<!-- Weather -->
|vo_03_01_title      = 비가 올 때…
|vo_03_01_subtitle   = When It Rains
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx         = 모험할 때 대부분 이런 날씨였어
|vo_03_01_rm         = Moheomhal ttae daebubun ireon nalssiyeosseo.
|vo_03_01_tl         = The weather was usually like this when I adventured.
|vo_03_02_title      = 번개가 칠 때…
|vo_03_02_subtitle   = When Thunder Strikes
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} When Thunder Strikes.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx         = 아! 나랑 너무 가깝게 서 있지 마. 그래야 벼락 안 맞아!
|vo_03_02_rm         = A! Narang neomu gakkapge seo itji ma. Geuraeya byeorak an maja!
|vo_03_02_tl         = Ah! Don't stand too near with me. You won't get struck by lightning by that way!
|vo_03_03_title      = 햇살이 좋을 때…
|vo_03_03_subtitle   = When the Sun Is Out
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Sun Is Out.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx         = 우와, 오늘 날씨 정말 좋다…. 아! 이런 말만 하면 항상 비가 왔었지
|vo_03_03_rm         = Oneul nalssi jeongmal jota... A! Ireon malman hamyeon hangsang biga wasseotji.
|vo_03_03_tl         = The weather is so good today... Ah! Whenever I said this, it always rained.
|vo_03_04_title      = 강풍이 불 때…
|vo_03_04_subtitle   = When the Wind Is Blowing
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Wind Is Blowing.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx         = 바람에 날아온 돌멩이에 안 맞게 조심해!
|vo_03_04_rm         = Barame naraon dolmeng'ie an matge josimhae!
|vo_03_04_tl         = Be careful not to get hit by the stone flown by the wind!

|vo_04_01_title      = 아침 인사…
|vo_04_01_subtitle   = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx         = 좋은 아침! 오늘은 어디로 모험하러 갈까?
|vo_04_01_rm         = Joeun achim! Oneureun eodiro moheomhareo galkka?
|vo_04_01_tl         = Good morning! Where should we go for an adventure today?
|vo_04_02_title      = 점심 인사…
|vo_04_02_subtitle   = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx         = 샌드위치 챙겨 왔는데, 먹을래? 반 나눠줄게… 으윽! 케, 켁… 미안, 목에 걸렸어
|vo_04_02_rm         = Sandeuwichi chaenggyeo watneunde, meogeullae? Ban nanwojulge... eueuk! Ke, {{Not a typo|ke|k}}... mian, moge geollyeosseo.
|vo_04_02_tl         = I've got some sandwich, would you like to have it? I'll give you half of it... Ugh! Cough... Sorry, it got stuck on my neck.
|vo_04_03_title      = 저녁 인사…
|vo_04_03_subtitle   = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = 아버지들과 이야기하러 가지 않을래? 베테랑 모험가들의 이야기는 정말 재밌어!
|vo_04_03_rm         = Abeojideulgwa iyagihareo gaji anneullae? Beterang moheomgadeul-ui iyagineun jeongmal jaemisseo!
|vo_04_03_tl         = Would you like to talk with my fathers? It's so exciting to hear veteran adventurers' stories!
|vo_04_04_title      = 굿나잇…
|vo_04_04_subtitle   = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = 가려고? 너와 함께 모험할 수 있어서 정말 기뻤어! 다음에도 꼭 불러줘!
|vo_04_04_rm         = Garyeogo? Neowa hamkke moheomhal su isseoseo jeongmal gippeosseo! Daeumedo kkok bulleojwo!
|vo_04_04_tl         = Are you leaving? It was so glad to adventure with you! Please call me next time!

|vo_05_01_title      = {name} 자신에 대해・모험단
|vo_05_01_subtitle   = About {character}: Adventure Team
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Adventure Team.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = 내가 바로 「베니 모험단」의 단장, 몬드의 모험가 길드를 일으킬 샛별이지…. 다른 단원들은 한 번도 못 봤다고? 그게… 다들 휴가 가서, 하하
|vo_05_01_rm         = Naega baro "Benny Moheomdan"ui danjang, Mondeu-ui Moheomga Gildeureul ireukil saetbyeoriji... Dareun danwondeureun han beondo mot bwatdago? Geuge... dadeul hyuga gaseo, haha.
|vo_05_01_tl         = I am the leader of "Benny's Adventure Team," and the rising star to make Mondstadt's Adventurers' Guild prosperous... You haven't met the other members, not even once? Well... Everyone's on a vacation, haha.
|vo_05_02_title      = {name} 자신에 대해・나쁜 운
|vo_05_02_subtitle   = About {character}: Bad Luck
|vo_05_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Bad Luck.ogg
|vo_05_02_tx         = 소문만큼 운이 나쁘진 않아. 길을 가다가 사냥꾼들이 설치한 함정에 빠진다든가, 갑자기 쓰러진 나무에 머리가 깨지는 정도랄까. 뭐 이런 일은 흔히 있는 거잖아, 안 그래?
|vo_05_02_rm         = Somunmankeum uni nappeujin ana. Gireul gadaga sanyangkkundeuri seolchihan hamjeong'e ppajindadeunga, gapjagi sseureoji namue meoriga kkaejineun jeongdoralkka. Mwo ireon ireun heunhi itneun geojana, an geurae?
|vo_05_02_tl         = I'm not that unlucky as how the rumors say. Just something like falling into a trap hunters made while walking, or my head getting hurt over a tree that suddenly fell. Those are quite normal happenings, aren't they?

|vo_06_01_title      = 우리에 대해・파트너
|vo_06_01_subtitle   = About Us: Teammates
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Teammates.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = 하하하, 안 돼. 「베니 모험단」은 이미 인원이 다 찼어…. 적합한 사람이 그렇게 많은데, 굳이 나같이 운이 나쁜 놈을 찾을 필요는 없잖아?
|vo_06_01_rm         = Hahaha, an dwae. "Benny Moheomdan"eun imi inwoni da chasseo... Jeokhaphan sarami geureoke maneunde, guji nagachi uni nappeun nomeul chajeul piryoneun eopjana?
|vo_06_01_tl         = Hahaha, no. "Benny's Adventure Team" is already full... There are so many suitable people, you don't have to obstinately find an unlucky guy like me, right?
|vo_06_02_title      = 우리에 대해・분업
|vo_06_02_subtitle   = About Us: Division of Labor
|vo_06_02_friendship    = 6
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Division of Labor.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = 앞으로 몬스터 유인과 함정 활성화는 내가 맡을 테니, 보물은 너한테 맡길게. 아, 안 된다고? 괜찮아. 내가 다칠까 봐 걱정하지 않아도 돼. 이건 내 전문이거든! 게다가 널 위해서라면, 얼마든지 할 수 있어!
|vo_06_02_rm         = Apeuro monseuteo yuingwa hamjeong hwalseonghwaneun naega mateul teni, bomureun neohante matgilge. A, andoendago? Gwaenchana. Naega dachilkka bwa geokjeonghaji anado dwae, igeon nae jeonmunigeodeun! Gedaga neol wihaeseoramyeon, eolmadeunji hal su isseo!
|vo_06_02_tl         = From now, I'll take care of luring monsters and activating traps, and I'll leave the treasure to you. Ah, I can't? It's alright. You don't have to worry about me getting hurt, this is my profession! And for you, I can do as much as I like!
|vo_06_03_title      = 우리에 대해・위험 지대
|vo_06_03_subtitle   = About Us: Dangerous Places
|vo_06_03_friendship    = 6
|vo_06_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Dangerous Places.ogg
|vo_06_03_tx         = 네가 왜 나랑 파트너하자고 했는지 알 것 같아. 너랑 난 닮았거든. 너도 위험한 상황을 즐기는 거야! 모험은 위험해서 더 짜릿한 법이지
|vo_06_03_rm         = Nega wae narang pateuneohajago haetneunji al geot gata. Neorang nan dalmatgeodeun. Neodo wiheomhan sanghwang'eul jeulgineun geoya! Moheomeun wiheomhaeseo deo jjarithan beobiji.
|vo_06_03_tl         = I think I understand why you wanted to be my partner. You and I have similarities. You enjoy dangerous situations too! An adventure is more thrilling because it is dangerous.

|vo_07_01_title      = 「신의 눈」에 대해…
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the [[Vision]]
|vo_07_01_friendship    = 4
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = 나처럼 운이 나쁜 사람도 신의 인정을 받을 수 있다니. 신도 날 포기하지 않았는데, 내가 어떻게 포기할 수 있겠어?
|vo_07_01_rm         = Nacheoreom uni nappeun saramdo Sin-ui injeong'eul badeul su itdani. Sindo nal pogihaji anatneunde, naega eotteotge pogihal su itgesseo?
|vo_07_01_tl         = Even an unlucky person like me can get acknowledged by God. Even God didn't give up on me, how can I give up?
|vo_07_02_title      = 하고 싶은 이야기…
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = Something to Share
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = 기회 되면 나중에 나랑 몬드의 야경을 감상하러 가지 않을래? 몬드성의 불이 밝혀지고, 시드르 호수에 달빛이 비치면 정말 아름답거든…. 어디서 봤냐고? 하하, 예전에 회오리에 휩쓸려 엄청 높은 곳까지 갔거든…. 뭐? 가고 싶지 않다고? 음, 알겠어…
|vo_07_02_rm         = Gihoe doemyeon najung'e narang Mondeu-ui yagyeong'eul gamsanghareo gaji anneullae? Mondeuseong-ui buri balkyeojigo, Sideureu Hosue dalbichi bichimyeon jeongmal areumdapgeodeun... Eodiseo bwatnyago? Haha, yejeone hoeorie hwipsseullyeo eomcheong nopeun gotkkaji gatgeodeun... Mwo, gago sipji antago? Eum, algesseo...
|vo_07_02_tl         = When we have time, why don't we go enjoy Mond's night scenery? When Mondstadt lights up, and the moonlight shines over Cider Lake, it's very beautiful... Where did I see it? Haha, some time ago, I got swept by a tornado so I went up very high... What? You don't want to go? Hmm, okay...
|vo_07_03_title      = 흥미있는 일…
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Interesting Things
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = 사실 난 양배추를 엄청 좋아해. 평범해 보이지만 빼놓을 수 없는 음식이잖아. 양배추는 여러 곳에서 자라는데, 다양한 식자재와 잘 어울리면서도 다른 재료의 맛을 해치지 않아. 사실 평범한 것도, 괜찮잖아
|vo_07_03_rm         = Sasil nan yangbaechureul eomcheong joahae. Pyeongbeomhae boijiman ppaenoeul su eomneun eumsigijana. Yangbaechuneun yeoreo goseseo jaraneunde, dayanghan sikjajaewa jal eoullimyeonseodo dareun jaeryo-ui maseul hachiji ana. Sasil pyeongbeomhan geotdo, gwaenchanjana.
|vo_07_03_tl         = I actually love cabbages. It seems common, but it's also food you cannot leave out. Cabbages grow in a lot of areas, and it goes along well with many ingredients while not damaging the flavors of others. Common things, actually are nice.

|vo_08_01_title      = 바바라에 대해…
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About [[Barbara]]
|vo_08_01_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Barbara.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = 바바라는 노래도 잘하고 춤도 잘 춰! 모험이 순조롭지 않을 때면 바바라의 공연을 보러 가는데, 관객들과 함께 구호를 외치고 응원을 하면 기분이 좋아진다니까, 정말 신기해! 그래서 그렇게 인기가 많은 거겠지…. 나도 그렇게 인기 많은 단장이면 좋겠다
|vo_08_01_rm         = 
|vo_08_01_tl         = She's good and singing and dancing as well! When my adventurers aren't smooth I go to see her performance, and when I chant and cheer with the crowd, it makes me happy, it's so amazing! That's probably why she's so popular... I wish I were a popular leader too.
|vo_08_02_title      = 클레에 대해…
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About [[Klee]]
|vo_08_02_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Klee.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = 그 아이는… 정말 귀엽긴 한데, 난 그 애와 반드시 거리를 유지해야 돼. 나랑만 있으면 그 애의 폭탄이 갑자기 터지거든…. 나야 원래 운이 나쁘니 괜찮지만, 클레가 다치기라도 하면 큰일이야. 그럼 기사단 사람들이 날 가만두지 않을 거라고
|vo_08_02_rm         = Geu aineun... jeongmal gwiyeopgin hande, nan geu aewa bandeusi georireul yujihaeyadwae. Narangman isseumyeon geu ae-ui poktani gapjagi teojigeodeun... Naya wonrae uni nappeuni gwaenchanchiman, Keullega dachigirado hamyeon keuniriya. Geureom gisadan saramdeuri nal gamanduji anneul georago.
|vo_08_02_tl         = That kid is... very cute, but I must stay a certain distance from her. If I'm with her, the kid's bombs suddenly explode... I'm usually unlucky so it's alright, but it's a big problem if Klee gets hurt. Then people of the Knights won't leave me alone.
|vo_08_03_title      = 피슬에 대해…
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About [[Fischl]]
|vo_08_03_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Fischl.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = 그녀는 이세계에서 온 「단죄의 황녀」인데, 정말 대단해! 그녀의 고향으로 모험을 가고 싶다고 여러 번 말했는데, 그럴 때마다 우물쭈물 거리더라고…. 음, 분명 내가 위험할까 봐 걱정해주는 거겠지. 그녀의 고향은 정말 무서운 곳인가 봐
|vo_08_03_rm         = Geunyeoneun isegye'eseo on "Danjoe-ui Hwangnyeo"inde, jeongmal daedanhae! Geunyeo-ui gohyang'euro moheomeul gago sipdago yeoreo beon malhaetneunde, geureol ttaemada umuljjumul georideorago... Eum, bunmyeongnaega wiheomhalkka bwa geokjeonghaejuneun geogetji. Geunyeo-ui gohyang'eun jeongmal museoun gosingabwa.
|vo_08_03_tl         = She is the "Prinzessin der Verurteilung" from another world, she's so awesome! I said multiple times that I want to go adventuring to her hometown, but she always hesitated... Hmm, she's probably worried that I'll get in danger. Her hometown must be a very scary place.
|vo_08_04_title      = 진에 대해…
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About [[Jean]]
|vo_08_04_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Jean.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = 진 단장에게 몬드의 모험가 길드에 대한 지원을 요청할 생각이었는데, 어떻게 말을 꺼내야 할지 모르겠어…. 우리 모험가 길드는 기사단처럼 규율이 많지 않거든. 항상 아버지들과는 자유롭게 웃고 떠드는데, 이런 태도로 진 단장과 말하면 안 되겠지…. 기사단의 경례하는 방식이라도 배워야 하나?
|vo_08_04_rm         = Jin danjang'ege Mondeu-ui Moheomga Gildeue daehan jiwoneun yocheonghal saenggagieotneunde, eotteotge mareul kkeonaeya halji moreugesseo... Uri Moheomga Gildeuneun gisadancheoreom gyuyuri manchi ankeodeun. Hangsang abeojideulgwaneun jayuropge utgo tteodeuneunde, ireon taedoro Jin danjanggwa malhamyeon an doegetji... Gisadan-ui gyeongryehaneun bangsigirado baewoya hana?
|vo_08_04_tl         = I was thinking of requesting support for Mond's Adventurers' Guild to Grandmaster Jean, but I don't know how to speak to her... The Adventurer's Guild doesn't have many rules like the Knights. I always freely laugh and talk around with my fathers, but I shouldn't speak like this attitude with Grandmaster Jean... Should I learn how to salute like the Knights?
|vo_08_05_title      = 바르카에 대해…
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About [[Varka]]
|vo_08_05_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Varka.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = 난 그를 무척 존경해. 그 유명한 대 단장님이잖아! 페보니우스 기사단을 이끌다니 정말 대단하셔. 그런데 생각해보니까, 모험단은 규모가 너무 크면 안 될 것 같아. 너무 바빠지면 아버지들을 돌볼 수가 없잖아. 하하, 역시 지금 이대로가 좋겠어
|vo_08_05_rm         = Nan geureul muchok jongyeonghae. Geu yumyeonghan dae danjangnimijana! Peboniuseu gisadaneun ikkeuldani jeongmal daedanhasyeo. Geureonde saenggakhaebonikka, moheomdaneun gyumoga neomu keumyeon an doel geot gata. Neomu bappajimyeon abeojideureul dolbol suga eopjjana. Haha, yeoksi jigeum idaeroga jokesseo.
|vo_08_05_tl         = I really respect him. He is the famous Grandmaster! It's so awesome of him to lead the Knights of Favonius. But when I think of it, I think the Adventure Team shouldn't be that big. If I get too busy, I can't take care of my fathers. Haha, right now would be good.
|vo_08_06_title      = 레이저에 대해…
|vo_08_06_subtitle   = About [[Razor]]
|vo_08_06_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Razor.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = 울프 영지의 그 소년? 험악해 보이고 말도 잘 안 하지만… 사실 되게 재밌는 사람이야! 우리 둘 다 고기를 엄청 좋아하는데, 내가 그에게 고기 요리를 해주면 그는 내게 늑대와 대화하는 법을 가르쳐 주지. 하하, 다음에 같이 갈래?
|vo_08_06_rm         = Ulpeu yeongji-ui geu sonyeon? Heomakhae boigo maldo jal an hajiman... sasil doege jaemitneun saramiya! Uri dul da gogireul eomcheong joahaneunde, naega geuege gogi yorireul haejumyeon geuneun naege neukdaewa daehwahaneun beobeul gareuchyeo juji. Haha, daeume gachi gallae?
|vo_08_06_tl         = The boy in Wolvendom? He seems intimidating and he doesn't speak much... But he's actually a really fun person! We both love meat, so when I cook him meat he teaches me how to talk with wolves. Haha, want to go together next time?
|vo_08_07_title      = 엠버에 대해…
|vo_08_07_subtitle   = About [[Amber]]
|vo_08_07_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Amber.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = 아아, 생각났어. 그 좌충우돌하는 여자애…. 그녀도 나처럼 자주 야외로 모험을 떠나! 단지… 길가에 솥만 있으면 항상 검은 연기와 함께 뭔가 탄 냄새가 나…. 아, 혹시 그녀도 운이 나쁜가?
|vo_08_07_rm         = Aa, saenggaknasseo. Geu jwachung'udolhaneun yeoja'ae... Geunyeodo nacheoreom jaju yaoero moheomeul tteona! Danji... gilgae sotman isseumyeon hangsang geomeun yeongiwa hamkke mwonga tan naemsaega na... A, hoksi geunyeodo uni nappeunga?
|vo_08_07_tl         = Ah, I remember. The haphazard girl... She goes adventuring outside quite often like me! However... Whenever there is a pot on the road, there are always black smoke and a burnt smell... Ah, is she unlucky too?
|vo_08_08_title      = 노엘에 대해…
|vo_08_08_subtitle   = About [[Noelle]]
|vo_08_08_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Noelle.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = 사실 꽤 오랫동안 그녀를 지켜봤는데 재능도 있고 엄청난 노력파지만 기사단에선 정식 기사가 아닌 메이드인 모양이야. 너~무 아깝지 않아? 에휴, 모험가 길드로 왔다면 벌써 엄청난 모험가가 됐을 텐데
|vo_08_08_rm         = Sasil kkwae oraet dong'an geunyeoreul jikyeobwatneunde jaeneungdo itgo eomcheongnan noryeokpajiman gisadaneseo jeongsik gisaga anin meideuin moyang'iya. Neo~mu akkaptji anna? Ehyu, Moheomga Gildeuro watdamyeon beolsseo eomcheongnan moheomgaga dwaesseul tende.
|vo_08_08_tl         = I've actually kept an eye on her for a long time, she seems talented and very hardworking but a maid than an official Knight in the Knights. Isn't it such a shame? Whew, if she came to the Adventurers' Guild, she would already be an amazing adventurer.

|vo_09_01_title      = {name}에 대해 알기・첫 번째
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = 나에 대해 알고 싶다고? 하하, 난 그냥 운이 나쁜 평범한 모험가일 뿐이야. 너의 전설적인 경험에 비하면 언급조차 부끄럽지
|vo_09_01_rm         = Nae daehae algo sipdago? Haha, nan geunyang uni nappeun pyeongbeomhan moheomgail ppuniya. Neo-ui jeonseoljeogin gyeongheome bihamyeon eongeupjocha bukkeureopji.
|vo_09_01_tl         = You want to know about me? Haha, I'm just an unlucky ordinary adventurer. Compared to your legendary experiences, it's not worth even mentioning.
|vo_09_02_title      = {name}에 대해 알기・두 번째
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_friendship    = 3
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = 「아버지들」…. 난 몬드의 연로한 모험가들을 이렇게 불러. 난 그분들이 아주 위험한 곳에서 주워온 고아래. 신기하지? 운이 이렇게 나쁜데도 누군가에게 구해져 지금까지 살아 있다니. 그야말로 기적이지
|vo_09_02_rm         = "Abeojideul"... Nan Mondeu-ui yeonrohan moheomgadeureul ireoke bulleo. Nan geubundeuri aju wiheomhan goseseo juwo'on goarae. Singihaji? Uni ireoke nappeundedo nugungaege guhaejyeo jigeumkkaji sara itdani. Geuyamallo gijeogiji.
|vo_09_02_tl         = "Fathers"... I call the old adventurers in Mond like this. I'm an orphan who they have picked up from a very dangerous place. Wonderful, isn't it? I'm this unlucky, but I'm still living because I was saved by someone. A miracle at its best.
|vo_09_03_title      = {name}에 대해 알기・세 번째
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_friendship    = 4
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = 눈치챘구나…. 하하, 맞아, 「베니 모험단」은 오래 전부터 나 혼자였어. 난 운이 안 좋은 편이라, 아무리 쉽고 안전한 모험도 위험해져버려. 누가 나 같은 단장을 따르겠어…. 너도 그렇게 생각해{{not a typo|？}}
|vo_09_03_rm         = Nunchichaetguna... Haha, maja, "Benni Moheomdan"eun orae jeonbuteo na honjayeosseo. Nan uni an joeun pyeonira, amuri swipgo anjeonhan moheomdo wiheomhaejyeobeoryeo. Nuga na gateun danjang'eul ttareugesseo... Neodo geureoke saenggakhae?
|vo_09_03_tl         = You found out... Haha, right, "Benny's Adventure Team" has only been me for a long time. I don't have much luck, so any easy and safe adventure can get dangerous. Who would follow a leader like me... You think like that too?
|vo_09_04_title      = {name}에 대해 알기・네 번째
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_friendship    = 5
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = 난 태어날 때부터 운이 나빴어. 하지만 이젠 익숙해. 사실 다르게 생각해보면 「운이 나쁜」게 좋은 일일 수도 있어. 운이 나빠서 죽을 수도 있다는 생각에, 살아있을 때 더 많은 곳을 모험하고 더 많은 사람을 만나야겠다고 생각했거든&mdash;&mdash;그렇지 않았으면 너와 만날 기회도 없었을 거야, 하하!
|vo_09_04_rm         = Nan tae'eonal ttaebuteo uni nappasseo. Hajiman ije iksukhae. Sasil dareuge saenggakhaebomyeon "Uni Nappeun"ge joeun iril sudo isseo. Uni nappaseo jugeul sudo itdaneun saenggage, saraisseul ttae deo maneun goseul moheomhago deo maneun sarameul mannayagetdago saenggakhaetgeodeun &mdash; geureochi annasseumyeon neowa mannal gihoedo eopsseosseul geoya, haha!
|vo_09_04_tl         = I have been unlucky since I was born. But now I'm used to it. When I think of it differently, being "unlucky" can be a good thing. Because of the thought that I might die because of my bad luck, I thought that I should adventure more places and meet more people when I'm living &mdash; If not, I wouldn't have had an opportunity to meet you, haha!
|vo_09_05_title      = {name}에 대해 알기・다섯 번째
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_friendship    = 6
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = 그러고 보니, 우리가 파트너가 된 지도 한참 됐네. 내겐 꿈이 있어. 몬드성의 모험가 길드가 7개국에서 가장 큰 길드가 된다면, 티바트 대륙을 일주할 거야! 「베니 모험단」은 가장 위대한 모험단이 될 거고 우리 둘은 가장 위대한 모험가가 되는 거지! 아… 넌 언제 가입된 거냐고? 에헤헤, 그런 사소한 건 신경 쓰지 마~
|vo_09_05_rm         = Geureogo boni, uriga pateuneoga doen jido hancham dwaetne. Naegen kkumi isseo. Mondeuseong-ui Moheomga Gildeuga chilgaegugeseo gajang keun gildeuga doendamyeon, Tibateu daeryugeul iljuhal geoya! "Benni Moheomdan"eun gajang widaehan moheomdani doel geogo uri dureun gajang widaehan moheomgaga doeneun geoji! A... neon eonje gaipdoen geonyago? Ehehe, geureon sasohan geon singyeong sseuji ma~
|vo_09_05_tl         = Speaking of which, it has been a long time since we've been partners. I have a dream. When Mondstadt's Adventurer's Guild becomes the biggest guild in the seven nations, I am going to travel around the whole Teyvat continent! "Benny's Adventure Team" will be the greatest adventure team and we will be the greatest adventurers! Ah... When did you sign up? Ehehe, don't care about those small things~

|vo_10_01_title      = {name}의 취미…
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = 난 뭐든 다 좋지만, 역시 모험하는 게 제일 좋아! 언젠가 이 세상에서 제일 진귀한 보물을 찾아낼 거야. 그럼 아버지들도 호강시켜드릴 수 있고, 몬드의 모험가 길드도 떠들썩해질 거야!
|vo_10_01_rm         = Nan mwodeun da jochiman, yeoksi moheomhaneun ge jeil joa! Eonjenga i sesang'eseo jeil jingwihan bomureul chajanael geoya. Geureom abeojideuldo hogangsikyeodeuril su itgo, Mondeu-ui Moheomga Gildeudo tteodeulsseokhaejil geoya!
|vo_10_01_tl         = I'm good with anything, but adventuring is the best! Someday I will find the most precious treasure in this world. Then I can let my fathers live in luxury, and Mond's Adventurers' Guild will be boisterous!
|vo_10_02_title      = {name}의 고민…
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = 굳이 말하자면… 운이 정말 나쁜 날은 기분이 별로야. 예를 들면 모험을 하면서 아무것도 못 찾거나, 아버지의 고질병이 도진다거나 하면 말이야. 그렇다고 이런 게 고민거리가 되진 않아. 자고 일어나면 다 잊어버리거든. 새로운 하루는 새롭게 시작해야지!
|vo_10_02_rm         = Guji malhajamyeon... Jeongmal uni nappeun nareun gibuni byeolloya. Yereul deulmyeon moheomeul hamyeonseo amugeotdo mot chatgeona, abeoji-ui gojilbyeong'i dojindageona hamyeon mariya. Geureotdago ireon ge gomingeoriga doejin ana. Jago ireonamyeon da ijeobeorigeodeun. Saeroun haruneun saeropge sijakhaeyaji!
|vo_10_02_tl         = Obstinately speaking.... In days with real bad luck, I don't feel that good. For example, not finding anything while adventuring, or when my father's chronic disease works up again. But these don't become my source of trouble. I forget everything after I sleep. A new day should start fresh!
|vo_10_03_title      = 좋아하는 음식…
|vo_10_03_subtitle   = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx         = 고기! 고기는 에너지를 가장 많이 채워주는 음식이지! 버섯 닭꼬치, 스테이크, 그리고 달콤달콤 닭고기 스튜! 모두 내가 자신 있는 요리야. 나와 함께 모험하면 절대 굶을 일은 없을 거야
|vo_10_03_rm         = Gogi! Gogineun eneojireul gajang mani chaewojuneun eumsigiji! Beoseot dakkochi, seuteikeu, geurigo dalkomdalkom dakkogi seutyu! Modu naega jasin itneun yoriya. Nawa hamkke moheomhamyeon jeoldae gulmeul ireun eopsseul geoya.
|vo_10_03_tl         = Meat! Meat is a food that fills up the most energy! Chicken-Mushroom Skewers, Steak, and Sweet Madames! Those are all recipes I'm confident in making. If you adventure with me, you will never starve.
|vo_10_04_title      = 싫어하는 음식…
|vo_10_04_subtitle   = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = 모험가가 편식하면 안 되지만 난 절운고추 같은 매운 음식은 잘 못 먹어…. 먹기만 하면 숨이 막혀서 숨을 쉬기만 해도 매워지는 것 같다니까? 게다가 먹으면 꼭 배탈이 나거든…. 이렇게 악마 같은 열매는 대체 어떻게 생겨난 걸까?
|vo_10_04_rm         = Moheomgaga pyeonsikhamyeon an doejiman nan jeorungochu gateun maeun eumsigeun jal mot meogeo... Meokgiman hamyeon sumi makhyeoseo sumeul swigima haedo maewojineun geot gatdanikka? Gedaga meogeumyeon kkok baetari nageodeun... Ireoke akma gateun yeolmaeneun daeche eotteoke saenggyeonan geolkka?
|vo_10_04_tl         = An adventurer shouldn't eat only what they want, but I'm not good at eating spicy food like Jueyun Chili... Whenever I eat them, I get suffocated so whenever I breathe it gets spicy, eh? And whenever I eat them I always get a stomachache... How did this devil-like fruit got into being?

<!-- Receiving a Gift -->
|vo_11_01_title      = 선물 획득・첫 번째
|vo_11_01_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: I
|vo_11_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 01.ogg
|vo_11_01_tx         = 너무 행복해! 헤헤… 으아! 설마 최근의 행운을 다 써버린 거 아니야…?
|vo_11_01_rm         = Neomu haengbokhae! Hehe... eua! Seolma choegun-ui haeng'uneul da sseobeorin geo aniya...?
|vo_11_01_tl         = I'm so happy! Hehe... Ah! Have I used up all the luck recently...?

|vo_11_02_title      = 선물 획득・두 번째
|vo_11_02_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: II
|vo_11_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 02.ogg
|vo_11_02_tx         = 역시 네가 만든 건 뭐든 맛있구나!
|vo_11_02_rm         = Yeoksi nega mandeun geon mwodeun masitguna!
|vo_11_02_tl         = Anything you make is delicious!

|vo_11_03_title      = 선물 획득・세 번째
|vo_11_03_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: III
|vo_11_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 03.ogg
|vo_11_03_tx         = 큰일이야… 배가 아프기 시작했어…
|vo_11_03_rm         = Keuniriya... baega apeugi sijakhaesseo...
|vo_11_03_tl         = Oh no... My stomach is starting to hurt...

|vo_12_01_title      = 생일…
|vo_12_01_subtitle   = Birthday
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = 생일 축하해! 올해엔 가장 좋은 운이 따르길! 헤헤, 걱정 마, 나쁜 운은 전염되지 않으니까. 내가 있는 한 그게 너한테 갈 일은 없어
|vo_12_01_rm         = Saeng'il chukhahae! Olhae'en gajang joeun uni ttareugil! Hehe, geokjeong ma, nappeun uneun jeonyeomdoeji anneunikka. Naega itneun han geuge neohante gal ireun eopsseo.
|vo_12_01_tl         = Happy birthday! I hope you have the best of luck this year! Hehe, don't worry, bad luck isn't contagious. As long as I'm here, it won't go to you.

|vo_13_01_title      = 돌파의 느낌・기
|vo_13_01_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_13_01_ascension  = 1
|vo_13_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 01.ogg
|vo_13_01_tx         = 운 빼고 모든 힘이 다 증가됐어! 하하
|vo_13_01_rm         = Un ppaego modeun himi da jeunggadwaesseo! Haha.
|vo_13_01_tl         = Except for luck, all of my strength have increased! Haha.
|vo_13_02_title      = 돌파의 느낌・승
|vo_13_02_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_ascension  = 2
|vo_13_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 02.ogg
|vo_13_02_tx         = 이렇게 너와 한 걸음 더 가까워졌어. 계속해서 노력할 거야!
|vo_13_02_rm         = Ireoke neowa han georeun deo gakkawojyeosseo. Gyesokhaeseo noryeokhal geoya!
|vo_13_02_tl         = I became one step closer to you with this. I'll keep working hard!
|vo_13_03_title      = 돌파의 느낌・전
|vo_13_03_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_ascension  = 4
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx         = 이렇게 강한 힘을 얻었으니, 너한테 보답해야겠지? 아 맞다! 엄청난 보물이 숨어있는 비경을 아는데, 같이 모험하러 갈래?
|vo_13_03_rm         = Ireoke ganghan himeul eodeosseuni, neohante bodaphaeyagetji? A matda! Eomcheongnan bomuri sumeoitneun bigyeong'eul aneunde, gachi moheomhareo gallae?
|vo_13_03_tl         = Now that I have earned such strong strength, I should pay back to you, right? Ah, right! I know a domain with a tremendous treasure, want to go adventure together?
|vo_13_04_title      = 돌파의 느낌・결
|vo_13_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_ascension  = 6
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx         = 네 덕분에 나도 다른 사람을 지킬 수 있는 힘을 갖게 됐어. 이제 사람들이 날 다르게 보겠지&mdash;&mdash;그 운이 나쁘고 항상 만신창이였던 베넷이, 드디어 듬직한 모험가가 됐다고! …에헤헤, 그러면 좋겠지만
|vo_13_04_rm         = Ne deokbune nado dareun saramdeureun jikil su itneun himeul gatge dwaesseo. Ije saramdeuri nal dareuge bogetji &mdash; geu uni nappeugo hangsang mansinchang'iyeotdeon Benesi, deudieo deumjikhan moheomgaga dwaetdago! ...Ehehe, geureomyeon joketjiman.
|vo_13_04_tl         = Thanks to you, I have a power that can protect others. Now people will look at me differently &mdash; the unlucky, always-hurt Bennett, finally became a reliable adventurer! ...Ehehe, I wish.
}}
